metadata.title: CVE-2018-16228 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The HNCP parser in tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a buffer over-read inprint-hncp.c:print_prefix().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
